pull.title: Net processing: Remove unused CNodeState.address member

rename.from: Net processing: Remove redundant CNode.address member
rename.to: Net processing: Remove unused CNode.address member

events.body: cr ACK a6b0fe206f4a696e7646e229731a891502c44405: patch looks correct and unused code should be removed

rename.from: Net processing: Remove unused CNode.address member
rename.to: Net processing: Remove unused CNodeState.address member

events.body: I've just realised there's an error in the PR title and commit log. This removes `CNodeState.address`, not `CNode.address`. The diff is correct, but the description is a bit misleading.

issue.title: Use C++11 member initializer in CNodeState
issue.body: This removes a bunch of boilerplate, makes the code easier to read. Also, C++11 member initialization avoids accidental uninitialized members.
